ExplntnTxt: SCHEDULE M, PART I, LINE 32: Mothers Against Drunk Driving (MADD) has contracts with third parties who promote vehicle donations, collect and sell the vehicles, and execute all paperwork required by various agencies.
The organization uses various brokers to sell marketable securities that are contributed to the organization.

THE ORGANIZATION USES MERRILL LYNCH TO PROCESS STOCK DONATIONS AND CARS 4 CAUSES TO PROCESS VEHICLE DONATIONS. THE ORGANIZATION WILL ALSO UTILIZE VARIOUS THIRD PARTIES ON AN AD HOC BASIS TO PROCESS OTHER TYPES OF NON-CASH DONATIONS.
The number of contributors reflects the number of donors, not the number of items donated.

LINE 4, BOOKS & PUBLICATIONS - MATERIALS WERE DONATED WITHOUT VALUES BY DONORS TO ARCHIVE. COLLECTION IS USED BY RESEARCHERS WHO STUDY HISTORIC PRESERVATION, ARCHITECTURE AND LOCAL HISTORY.
